name: LD51 - Tormenting Idol
description:
Submitted for Ludum dare 51 - Every 10 Seconds.

Its been 2 year since I competed in a jam and Ive had as much fun this time as I remember from the last ones. Took it a bit easier on this one, the game is a little bare bones with a focus on making my own art and sound effects whish I use to struggle with. This weekend has been me taking my microphone around my flat recording every sound I could make and curating them down to a short list of sufficiently creepy ones.

Tormenting Idol takes the theme literally, a cursed Idol will chase you around a maze when the fog rolls in and will be frozen (sortof?) until the fog rolls back in again. this will happen every 10 seconds.

How to play:

- Dont get caught!

- Retrieve the three keys around the level

- Bring them back to the starting pedistals.

- The Idols a little shy, looking at it will cause it to slow but not stop it!

The idol will get more aggressive the closer you are to defeating them.

- 1 key - increased movement speed, even when stunned

- 2 keys - unlocks the ability to teleport, evem when the fog is thinner.

Controls:

- WASD - Movement

- Mouse - look horizontally

Tools Used:

- Unity3d 2021.3.11f1

- GIMP 2.10.20

- Audacity 3.2.0
